attributes.action: think more, put more money, awareness into child abuse and domestic violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: you should read..'cry silent tears' by joe peters, and look into child abuse and domestic violence.you, as a priminister, who wasn't even voted in, tend to ignore the NORMAL people and what they have to endure. why do you not have any thought, care or funds for the suffering british when you have funds for killing and bringing immigrants into this country? There are so many children and women out there that desperately, need your help in changing the way, we, as victims are believed. If you do anything while you have the chance, please enforce a law that will stop this.I would appreciate a reply.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
